channel.title: New Episode of Fear of a Black Dragon! Explore the Dead Planet!
channel.description:
In the newest episode of Fear of a Black Dragon, I have a nibble on Tom's ear as he and I settle into... Dead Planet!
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/fear-of-a-black-dragon/dead-planet

The Basic Crawl 00:00:21 - Overview 00:05:08 - Things we liked about the module 00:19:09 - Questions we had about the module 00:28:55 - Chain Lightning Round
The Expert Delve 00:31:14 - How to humanize unlikable communities
Companion Adventures 00:58:15 - Music 00:59:26 - Films 01:00:18 - Games
